introduction: Killed by a landmine, a soul of a young peasant Taro rose up to the celestial world where he found love with an angelic beauty. Reincarnated without losing the memory of his previous life, one day Taro meets a girl with a striking resemblance of his celestial lover... and this coincidence throws Taro's fate into a completely different path altogether... The first Masalanimation ever, an exotic mix of animation with Masala flavour!
